Package utils

Interface DatabaseUtilsInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseUtils
    interface DatabaseUtilsInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ArrayList<Request> getRequests()
      This function returns the list of all requests from our database.
      Snapshot retrieveSnapshotFromId​(int snapshotId)  
      User retrieveUserFromId​(long userId, String userName)
      This function is going to insert a user if said user is not present yet This function will be called by UpdateReceiver whenever an update is received, so it must be somewhat efficient if user not exists, creates it as well.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveUserFromId

        User retrieveUserFromId​(long userId,
                        String userName)
        This function is going to insert a user if said user is not present yet This function will be called by UpdateReceiver whenever an update is received, so it must be somewhat efficient if user not exists, creates it as well. Level of user is default level on creation
        Returns:
        reference to User instance

      • getRequests

        ArrayList<Request> getRequests()
        This function returns the list of all requests from our database. Function will be called from Main.java when the code is run for the first time, so that the requests that are already present will be submitted to the UpnotifyReceiver.
        Returns:
        reference to list of Request instances

      • retrieveSnapshotFromId

        Snapshot retrieveSnapshotFromId​(int snapshotId)
        Parameters:
        snapshotId -
        Returns:
        snapshot with resp. Id
